description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治人物、律师，曾是反对党领袖。
description.en: Singaporean politician, lawyer, and former opposition leader.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚的一个岛国及城市国家。
description.en: An island country and city-state in Southeast Asia.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的主要反对党之一。
description.en: One of the main opposition parties in Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡国会的一个集选区，邓亮洪曾于1997年在此参选。
description.en: A Group Representation Constituency of the Parliament of Singapore where Tang Liang Hong contested in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚国家，与新加坡相邻。
description.en: A country in Southeast Asia, neighboring Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个州，邓亮洪曾短暂逗留于此。
description.en: A state in Malaysia where Tang Liang Hong briefly stayed.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚柔佛州的首府。
description.en: The capital of the Malaysian state of Johor.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡首任总理，在1997年大选后控告邓亮洪诽谤。
description.en: The first Prime Minister of Singapore, who sued Tang Liang Hong for defamation after the 1997 general election.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡第二任总理，在1997年大选后控告邓亮洪诽谤。
description.en: The second Prime Minister of Singapore, who sued Tang Liang Hong for defamation after the 1997 general election.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的特别行政区，邓亮洪曾在此流亡。
description.en: A special administrative region of the People's Republic of China, where Tang Liang Hong was once in exile.

description.zh-cn: 大洋洲国家，邓亮洪在此寻求政治庇护。
description.en: A country in Oceania where Tang Liang Hong sought political asylum.

nodes.id: 与李光耀较量：新加坡异见者邓亮洪回忆录

zh-cn: 与李光耀较量：新加坡异见者邓亮洪回忆录
en: The Tang Liang Hong memoirs: my story with Lee Kuan Yew

description.zh-cn: 邓亮洪所著的回忆录，描述了人民行动党如何用行政和司法手段限制反对党，并操弄选举制度。
description.en: A memoir by Tang Liang Hong describing how the People's Action Party used administrative and judicial means to restrict opposition parties and manipulate the electoral system.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party in Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 曾存在于新加坡的大学，邓亮洪是其校友。
description.en: A former university in Singapore, of which Tang Liang Hong is an alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的一所公立研究型大学，邓亮洪是其校友。
description.en: A public research university in Singapore, of which Tang Liang Hong is an alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 在1997年国会大选中作为新加坡工人党候选人出战静山集选区。
description.en: Ran as a candidate for the Workers' Party in the Jalan Besar Group Representation Constituency during the 1997 general election.

description.zh-cn: 在1997年大选后，与时任总理吴作栋等共11人一同控告邓亮洪诽谤。
description.en: After the 1997 general election, along with then-Prime Minister Goh Chok Tong and 9 others, sued Tang Liang Hong for defamation.

description.zh-cn: 在1997年大选后，与时任内阁资政李光耀等共11人一同控告邓亮洪诽谤。
description.en: After the 1997 general election, along with then-Senior Minister Lee Kuan Yew and 9 others, sued Tang Liang Hong for defamation.

description.zh-cn: 李光耀控告邓亮洪诽谤，邓亮洪则在其回忆录《与李光耀较量》中记录了两人的政治对抗。
description.en: Lee Kuan Yew sued Tang Liang Hong for defamation, and Tang documented their political confrontation in his memoir, 'Contesting with Lee Kuan Yew'.

description.zh-cn: 1997年大选前后，邓亮洪向警方报告死亡恐吓未被受理，并被税局指控逃税，其妻子的护照也曾遭没收，这些事件导致他最终流亡海外。
description.en: Around the 1997 general election, Tang Liang Hong's report to the police about death threats was not accepted, he was accused of tax evasion by the tax authorities, and his wife's passport was confiscated, which ultimately led to his exile.

relationships.target: 与李光耀较量：新加坡异见者邓亮洪回忆录

description.zh-cn: 邓亮洪是《与李光耀较量：新加坡异见者邓亮洪回忆录》的作者。
description.en: Tang Liang Hong is the author of 'The Tang Liang Hong memoirs: my story with Lee Kuan Yew'.

description.zh-cn: 根据邓亮洪的回忆录，人民行动党通过操纵选举规则、限制公共经费、重新划分选区等手段来压制包括新加坡工人党在内的反对党。
description.en: According to Tang Liang Hong's memoir, the People's Action Party suppressed opposition parties, including the Workers' Party, by manipulating election rules, limiting public funds, and redrawing constituencies.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡工人党是新加坡的主要反对党，与执政的人民行动党构成政治竞争关系。
description.en: The Workers' Party is a main opposition party in Singapore, in political competition with the ruling People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科页面分类，邓亮洪是南洋大学的校友。
description.en: According to Wikipedia page categories, Tang Liang Hong is an alumnus of Nanyang University.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科页面分类，邓亮洪是新加坡国立大学的校友。
description.en: According to Wikipedia page categories, Tang Liang Hong is an alumnus of the National University of Singapore.
